_header: Gold and all this worlds win is nought but Christs rood
_description: I would be clothed in Christ’s skin — one 8-line stanza (abababab) in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Gold & al þis werdis wynIs nouth but cristis
                    rode…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…þan ȝef i litel of kith or kynffor þer is alle
                    gode Amen
